'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
A small dwarf village located to the extreme northwest of the archipelago, away from civilization and the politics of Deadfire. Unfortunately, this also means that it's been vulnerable to manipulation - say, by an unscrupulous jumped-up imp... The village was founded by a small tribe of boreal dwarves that migrated north from the White that Wends over a land bridge centuries ago, settling on a desert island where snow is of no concern to them.

==Points of interest==
* A small village with huts from clay bricks surrounding an effigy of [[Nemnok the Devourer]].

==Characters==
* [[Anniq]], the village elder
* [[Tatok]], the local blacksmith
* [[Gabel]], food trader

==Loot==
* [[Hearth Defender's Scale]]: Reward for saving Kaali.
* [[Nalvi]]: East side, in front of a clay hut.
* [[Ulk]]: West side, near Gabel.
